metric_test_requirements.comment: identifier can be given as user input

metric_test_requirements.comment: identifier can be given as user input

results.metric_name: Metadata includes descriptive core elements (creator, title, data identifier, publisher, publication date, summary and keywords) to support data findability.

FsF-F2-01M-1.metric_test_name: Metadata has been made available via common web methods

FsF-F2-01M-2.metric_test_name: Core data citation metadata is available

core_metadata_found.title: INVocD: Identifier Name Vocabulary Dataset
creator: Yu, Yijun
Wermelinger, Michel
Butler, Simon
Sharp, Helen
https://oro.open.ac.uk/id/person/ext-hcs2
core_metadata_found.summary: NVocD is a dataset of the identifier name declarations and vocabulary found in 60 FLOSS Java projects where the source code structure is recorded and the identifier name vocabulary is made directly available, offering advantages for identifier name research over conventional source code models. The dataset has been used to support a range of research projects from identifier name analysis to concept location, and provides many opportunities to researchers.
object_identifier: Butler, Simon <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/sjb792.html>; Wermelinger, Michel <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/mw4687.html>; Yu, Yijun <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/yy66.html> and Sharp, Helen <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/hcs2.html> (2013).  INVocD: Identifier Name Vocabulary Dataset.   In: 10th Working Conference on Mining Software Repositories, 18-19 May 2013, San Francisco.

Butler, Simon <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/sjb792.html>; Wermelinger, Michel <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/mw4687.html>; Yu, Yijun <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/yy66.html> and Sharp, Helen <https://oro.open.ac.uk/view/person/hcs2.html> (2013).  INVocD: Identifier Name Vocabulary Dataset.   In: 10th Working Conference on Mining Software Repositories, 18-19 May 2013, San Francisco.

results.metric_name: Metadata includes the identifier of the data it describes.

FsF-F3-01M-1.metric_test_name: Metadata contains data content related information (file name, size, type)

FsF-F3-01M-2.metric_test_name: Metadata contains a PID or URL which indicates the location of the downloadable data content

test_debug: INFO: No debug messages received

results.metric_name: Metadata is offered in such a way that it can be retrieved programmatically.

FsF-F4-01M-1.metric_test_name: Metadata is given in a way major search engines can ingest it for their catalogues (JSON-LD, Dublin Core, RDFa)

FsF-F4-01M-2.metric_test_name: Metadata is registered in major research data registries (DataCite)

metric_test_requirements.comment: The presence of a (typed, default = related) related resource is checked, can be a string or URI
